tutorial.title: Present Value of an Annuity
tutorial.scenario:
How much should you invest now so that starting one year from today your daughter can receive $6,000 per year for the next five years? Assume the discount rate is 15%.

Play
tutorial.step: Press the RESET button to clear all the previous entries.
Enter the periodic payment (in this case 6000), and then press the PMT button.
Enter the periodic interest rate (in this case 15), and then press the I/Y button.
Enter the number of periods (in this case 5), and then press the N button.
Press the CPT button and then the PV button to solve for the present value of the annuity.
